attributes.action: prevent Greenwich Borough Council's planners from continuing their campaign to close down Royal Teas on Royal Hill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Teas has been the best cafe in Greenwich for many years.  Due to a planning technicality, LB Greenwich have been trying to close it down for over 2 years.  The matter reached the Court of Appeal yesterday.  Noone save LBG planners wants Royal Teas to disappear.
